name: Big Jump Master 2015
description:
**New for 2015**

From the makers of Crash Master comes the next generation of one touch racing games - Big Jump Master 2015. Select your car, race down the track, jump just the right way to hit the target. Big jumps, big fun.


Features:
**6 Cars to Choose From
**Awesome One Touch Gaming
**4 Different Courses
**32 Challenging Levels
**Realistic Racing Physics
**Huge Crashes

Get started, its awesome. You can't go wrong!
